article_title: Denver Nuggets players who have scored 50 in a game
article_text:
Danilo Gallinari scored a career-high 47 points in the Denver Nuggets’ 144-143 double overtime loss to the Dallas Mavericks on Friday. While it was certainly a phenomenal game for Gallo, the points total didn’t land him in the franchise’s top all-time list.

In fact, there have been 10 times that a Denver player has scored 50 or more points since the team joined the NBA in 1976.

Here’s the list:

Nuggets players who have dropped 50
